games.title: Wuthering Waves
games.desc: Wuthering Waves is a story-rich open-world action RPG with a high degree of freedom. You wake from your slumber as a Rover.
games.tags: Action RPG, Open World, Gacha, Post-Apocalyptic

games.title: Elden Ring
games.desc: Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.
games.tags: Soulslike, Dark Fantasy, Open World, RPG

games.title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.desc: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power and glamour.

games.title: Valorant
games.desc: A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities.

games.title: BioShock
games.desc: Explore the undersea city of Rapture, a haven for society's greatest minds that has devolved into a dystopian nightmare.

games.title: Tiny Bunny
games.desc: A non-linear horror visual novel set in a quiet village lost in the Siberian forest. Be careful what you wish for.

anime.title: Frieren
anime.desc: Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land.
anime.tags: Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adventure, Drama

anime.title: Your Name
anime.desc: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

anime.title: Edgerunners
anime.desc: A street kid tries to survive in a technology and body modification-obsessed city of the future.
